review: Use it all the time...Hulu, Netflix, etc....
author: ursa

review: I bougt this device because I wanted an inexpensive way to stream movies from my phone or computer to the TV. In reality it doesn't work at all for this purpose, everytime I try to stream an HD movie even on standard definition it get cut out and keep disconnecting. It is really hard to see a full length movie! And I have a very fast internet connection, so that's not a problem.I would not recommend this to anyone. I think it would be better to buy an android dongle.
author: MD

review: This little is a lot smarter then my smart TV

review: This is somewhat convenient but seems to freeze up alot.

review: Perfect! I lived in an apt for a couple months and didn't want to start cable but still wanted to watch tv. Perfect if you love netflix!
